Smart AC for Seniors - A smart air conditioner designed specifically for seniors, with a user-friendly interface and voice control through Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant. Solar Powered Air Conditioner - A portable air conditioner that runs on solar power, using a built-in solar panel to charge a rechargeable battery during the day and providing cooling at night.
